string.text: You have arrived at {TUTORIAL_SETTLEMENT_NAME}. To explore the location, you can enter the settlement by pressing the highlighted button on the left.
Можно фильтровать элементы с помощью кнопки в верхней части. Фильтр их смешанная.
У вас есть активный квест! Вы можете узнать больше об этом, нажав на поиски входа в левом нижнем углу экрана.
Вы должны приобрести расходные материалы в меню поселения на левом.
Your brother recommends that you purchase 2 sacks of grain.{newline}{newline}You can do this by transferring them to your inventory with the little arrow on the left side
Notables help you recruit more and better (higher level) troops according to your relation with them.{newline}{newline}Click on some troops to move them into your party.
To leave a mission, you can hold down the "Tab" key.{newline}{newline}This will return you to the settlement menu where you can purchase supplies and hire recruits.

Welcome to Calradia!{newline}{newline}You can explore the world map by moving the camera with WASD, panning your view by right clicking and dragging your mouse and zooming in and out with the mouse wheel.{newline}{newline}Give it a try.
В начале боя ваши солдаты будут держать свои позиции. Вы можете сказать им, чтобы поручить открытия ордеров движение с "F1" и выбираем "Следуй за мной" с "F2".
You can move your character:{newline}- Forwards with [W]{newline}- Backwards with [S]{newline}- Left with [A]{newline}- Right with [D]{newline}{newline}Try them all now!
Finish the track and hit targets as many as you can ({HIT} / {ALL}))
To leave a mission, you can hold down the Tab key.{newline}{newline}This will return you to the settlement menu where you can purchase supplies and hire recruits.
The menu on the top right shows the important people in your current location.{newline}{newline}Click on the headman's portrait to talk to him.

Moving your party is done by clicking on the map. This will leave a mark on the target location - unless you have clicked on inaccessible areas such as mountains or sea.{newline}{newline}Let’s set off to {TUTORIAL_SETTLEMENT_NAME}!
Вы можете сказать своим людям, чтобы заряжать от открытия ордеров движение с "F1" и выбираем плату с "F3".
You can hold "Left Alt" key to see the location of the Headman.{newline}{newline}Once you are near him, press F to speak with him.

После тяжелой битвы у вас может быть выбор: взять несколько пленных или завербовать тех, кого вы освободили от своего врага. {newline}{newline}Both options are done by transferring the troops to your party with the little arrow button on the left.
Your brother has asked you to hire at least 4 men before you set out to face the raiders.{newline}{newline}You can hire troops from villages and towns by clicking on the "Recruit Troops" button.
Миссии по укрытию начинаются с того, что враг не знает о вашем приближении. {newline}{newline}Order your troops to follow you with the "F1" and "F2" shortcuts and try to take them on in small groups.
Нажмите на кнопку "Соединиться", чтобы вернуться к заметным и узнать больше о предстоящей работе.
